LanguageData.TKKN_FlagstoneBasalt.label: basalt flagstone
LanguageData.TKKN_FlagstoneBasalt.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorAmber.label: amber tile floor
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorAmber.description: Carefully-cut and fit fancy tiles. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorPertrifiedWood.label: petrified wood floor
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorPertrifiedWood.description: Carefully-cut and fit fancy planks. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorRedWood.label: red wood floor
LanguageData.TKKN_FloorRedWood.description: Carefully-cut and fit fancy planks. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.

LanguageData.TKKN_HotSpringsWater.tools.water.label: water

LanguageData.TKKN_Salted_Earth.label: salted earth
LanguageData.TKKN_Salted_Earth.description: Dirt with salt mixed in. Nothing will grow here for a long time.
LanguageData.TKKN_SaltField.label: salt field

LanguageData.TKKN_Tile_MorbidBasalt.description: Fine stone tiles in a morbid style.

LanguageData.TKKN_Tile_SpikecoreBasalt.description: Fine stone tiles in a spikecore style.
LanguageData.TKKN_Tile_TotemicBasalt.label: totemic basalt tile
LanguageData.TKKN_Tile_TotemicBasalt.description: Fine stone tiles in a totemic style.
LanguageData.TKKN_TileBasalt.label: basalt tile
LanguageData.TKKN_TileBasalt.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TKKN_WetMossyTerrain.label: wet lichen-covered dirt
